name: customer_analysis
query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_customers, COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) as unique_customers, AVG(credit_score) as avg_credit_score FROM customers

name: order_summary
query: SELECT order_status, COUNT(*) as order_count, SUM(total_amount) as total_revenue FROM orders WHERE order_date >= TIMESTAMP '2023-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY order_status ORDER BY total_revenue DESC

name: lineitem_analysis
query: SELECT line_status, COUNT(*) as line_count, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM lineitem WHERE ship_date >= TIMESTAMP '2023-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY line_status

name: customer_order_join
query: SELECT c.region, COUNT(DISTINCT c.customer_id) as customer_count, COUNT(o.order_id) as total_orders FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date >= TIMESTAMP '2023-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY c.region

name: products_analysis
query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_products, COUNT(DISTINCT category) as unique_categories, COUNT(DISTINCT brand) as unique_brands FROM products

name: events_analysis
query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_events, COUNT(DISTINCT event_type) as unique_event_types FROM events WHERE event_timestamp >= TIMESTAMP '2023-01-01 00:00:00'

name: complex_join
query: SELECT c.region, COUNT(DISTINCT c.customer_id) as customer_count, COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) as order_count FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN lineitem l ON o.order_id = l.order_id WHERE o.order_date >= TIMESTAMP '2023-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY c.region

name: revenue_by_date
query: SELECT YEAR(o.order_date) as order_year, MONTH(o.order_date) as order_month, COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) as order_count FROM orders o WHERE o.order_date >= TIMESTAMP '2023-01-01 00:00:00' AND o.order_date < TIMESTAMP '2024-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY YEAR(o.order_date), MONTH(o.order_date)

name: top_customers
query: SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, COUNT(o.order_id) as order_count, SUM(total_amount) as total_revenue FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date >= TIMESTAMP '2023-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.customer_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 10

name: product_performance
query: SELECT p.brand, p.category, COUNT(DISTINCT l.order_id) as order_count, SUM(l.quantity) as total_quantity FROM products p JOIN lineitem l ON p.product_id = l.product_id WHERE l.ship_date >= TIMESTAMP '2023-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY p.brand, p.category ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 10
